attributes.title: Worst App Ever 🤮
attributes.review: Just an awful app but Trump is racist, sexist, homophobic, and classist. So, the fact that he has an app is unbelievable.

attributes.title: ew
attributes.review:
i opened up the app to see a racist, rapist, and more
very disturbed and disappointing
i thought orange cheetos were better than this 
probably gonna beat to all these bad reviews later

attributes.title: this app killed my hamster.
attributes.review: i got the app to be updated in politics. instead i was greeted by a big cheeto man. that was so unappreciative. my hamster was sitting next to me and as soon as he saw the cheeto he was into a shock. this app killed my hamster.

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: This app is just terrible it’s not even good it’s just no

attributes.title: ✨terrible✨
attributes.review: i open the app to see rather inappropriate photos of mr trump. i continue searching for good news, when i come across a cheeto puff dancing on a pole! i am emotionally ruined. please dont download this app. 😔🔫

attributes.title: no more🦋🧚‍♀️✨
attributes.review: this app is dis cos ting! there is a cheeto as a the main character. i cant surf the subways and this man is just quite unpleasant. i don’t like it in there and i will now be unloading. please get someone to replace the cheeto in 2020 and i might download🥰
